author: ChrisUbben

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: Is there any test we can add to catch any new HTTP URLs added to the product code?

comments.author: ChrisUbben
comments.body:
I created an issue to add some way to verify if new HTTP links have been added to the product code.
New issue #3347.

title: Update all W3 links in the resource files to use HTTPS instead of HTTP
